ygData.subject: Re: Why I don't play a Warrior
ygData.msgSnippet: James...I share your sentiments.  I just checked onelist.com, and found several other warrior lists, as well as lists for each server.  I was amazed at the
ygData.messageBody:
James...I share your sentiments. I just checked onelist.com, and found
several other warrior lists, as well as lists for each server. I was amazed
at the amount of EQ based mailing lists. Just thought I'd pass that on.

Leri
-----Original Message-----
From: James Wofford <James.Wofford@...>
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 11:56 AM
Subject: RE: [warriors_eq] Why I don't play a Warrior


>From: James Wofford <James.Wofford@...>
>
>I still read this list cause I do not know of another one. This list has
>grown stale after its initial opening and offeres very little as far as
>warrior information is concerned. I know that we all have alot of
>information to give, just no one really posts anything constructive or
>useful anymore. So lets actually find a topic and get going with it. A
>CONSTRUCTIVE TOPIC.
>
>Dyvim Kincaid
>Warrior of Cazic Thule
>
>> -----Original Message-----
>> From: Jones, Brian [mailto:brian.jones@...]
>> Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 12:16 PM
>> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
>> Subject: RE: [warriors_eq] Why I don't play a Warrior
>>
>>
>> From: "Jones, Brian" <brian.jones@...>
>>
>> That isn't the point John Zwanenburg. The inital post made by
>> Wayne started
>> out saying "Warriors suck..." and continued to degrade the class from
>> there. He happened to use a cleric to back up his points on why warriors
>> sucked. I felt it was my duty to defend a class that I put hard work
into
>> and, I might add, I play QUITE well. Comparing warriors to
>> clerics is like
>> comparing apples to oranges, there is no comparison. Oh yeah
>> and John, you
>> DID say that you can take as well as a warrior....here is your
>> exact words.
>>
>> > My cleric can
>> > take just as good as a warrior, my ac is damn high and my buffs add to
>> > that.
>> >
>> You might have meant 'tank' and fat fingered, but in the context that you
>> presented there it does seem like you were saying your cleric can take
>> (damage) as good as a warrior. Even if you said tank I still
>> would disagree
>> with you.
>>
>> And I don't think anyone is reading this list because they moved
>> to another
>> one.
>>
>>
>> > ----------
>> > From: Zwanenburg, John[SMTP:ZWANENJ@...]
>> > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
>> > Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 12:47 PM
>> > To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com'
>> > Subject: RE: [warriors_eq] Why I don't play a Warrior
>> >
>> > From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>
>> >
>> > Jynxx,
>> >
>> > Gee did we hit a nerve there or what? Last time i checked the amount of
>> > people actually using this board was less than 5. And yeah i know its a
>> > warriors discussion board but oh whats this? Even tho we are
>> talking about
>> > clerics AND warriors, we are discussing something!!! Isnt that
>> the point?
>> >
>> > Oh and Brian jones, i didnt say that I could take as much
>> damage, i said i
>> > could tank just as well. My cleric isnt skimping out on HP but he isnt
a
>> > troll warrior. I ususally tank for my group.
>> >
>> > Oh and Jynxx, Ive taken damage from level 30ish mobs with both
>> my warrior
>> > and cleric and yeah i can last.
>> >
>> > If your pissed, flame me back, i couldnt care less. If you dont want to
>> > discuss this then fine. That doesnt bother me either, but this is a
>> > discussion board and yes our topic right now does include
>> warriors. Oh and
>> > one last time for the record. My cleric is far better than my
>> warrior ever
>> > was.
>> >
>> > (BTW: My warrior is level 43 and my cleric is level 34)
>> >
>> > Rayne
>> >
>> > > ----------
>> > > From: Jynxx[SMTP:jynxx@...]
>> > > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
>> > > Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 1:21 PM
>> > > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
>> > > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Why I don't play a Warrior
>> > >
>> > > From: "Jynxx" <jynxx@...>
>> > >
>> > > Ok...clerics heal. Blah blah blah....who cares? This is a board for
>> > > WARRIORS, not clerics. I am sorry if I am offending anyone by saying
>> > this,
>> > > but please keep your cleric opinions to yourselves. If I
>> wanted to hear
>> > > about the virtues of playing a cleric vs. playing a warrior I
>> would have
>> > > joined a cleric board. Last time I looked the list was called
>> > > 'Warriors_eq'
>> > > and had nothing to do with Clerics. If you have fun playing a
>> cleric out
>> > > there, be down...have all the fun you want. Just don't tell me that I
>> > > don't
>> > > do anything because I am a warrior because even with all your
>> heals you
>> > > couldn't be half as vital in a group as I am. Without a
>> warrior to save
>> > > your
>> > > arse from getting hit by that 31st level mob you'd be dead in
>> 7 seconds
>> > > flat...well maybe 10 if you got a heal in there. Bottom line:
>> Don't come
>> > > to
>> > > my board telling me I suck, cause it's gonna tick me (and a
>> lot of other
>> > > GOOD warriors) off really bad.
>> > >
>> > > Tyveris,
>> > > Blue Samurai of the Butterfly Rank
>> > >
>> > > ----- Original Message -----
>> > > From: Clancy <tcashio3@...>
>> > > To: <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
>> > > Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 10:39 AM
>> > > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Why I don't play a Warrior
>> > >
>> > >
>> > > > From: "Clancy" <tcashio3@...>
>> > > >
>> > > > Umm... whoever says this about clerics is stupid as hell
>> > > >
>> > > > At lvl 31 I group consistantly with a cleric. This class
>> is amazing.
>> > > If
>> > > > you think all they do is heal, you are very very wrong.
>> Their dd's do
>> > > stun
>> > > > (amazing for rogues) and they can heal better than any
>> other class. I
>> > > want
>> > > > to see your two druids heal you to full from 1 bar of life
>> > > >
>> > > > Also if all you fight is yellows and reds you need to rethink your
>> > > leveling
>> > > > process. Whites and blues are excellent to fight if you
>> are in groups
>> > > that
>> > > > handle large numbers well. Before you say all clerics do is heal,
>> > play
>> > > one,
>> > > > or play with a good one.
>> > > >
>> > > >
